thread.title: 8 must-have iPhone accessories under $20
thread.title_full: 8 must-have iPhone accessories under $20 - Business Insider

author: Brandt Ranj
title: 8 must-have iPhone accessories under $20
text:
The Insider Picks team writes about stuff we think you'll like. Business Insider has affiliate partnerships, so we get a share of the revenue from your purchase.
REUTERS/Mike Segar
The world of iPhone accessories is vast, and can range from basic to extravagant .
All of the products on this list cost under $20 and will help keep your iPhone charged and protected, and help keep you entertained.
For many people, myself included, our smartphone is the center of our digital world. Why not make the most of it?
View As: One Page Slides A phone case Amazon One of the biggest reasons people don't put an iPhone case on is because of the added weight and bulk, but with this case, that's not a problem. Heftier cases will provide more support, but if you're looking for the bare minimum to prevent scratching and some resistance if your phone falls, this is a good option.
Clear JETech iPhone Case, $6.99, available at Amazon
A portable battery Amazon I've beaten this drum before, but for good reason. There's no reason not to have an external battery pack anymore; they're inexpensive, can fit easily in a pocket or purse, and will charge your phone in a pinch. I've used Anker batteries for years and continue to recommend them to my family and friends. They're rock solid performers.
Anker Astro E1 5200mAh Portable Charger, $15.99, available at Amazon
A pair of earbuds Amazon I love a good pair of headphones, but it's easier to wear a pair of earbuds if you're commuting or going on a trip. This pair from Francois et Mimi have a wooden finish, integrated mic, and are noise-isolating. I've read enough good things about them that I'm going to be giving them a try myself soon.
Francois et Mimi Elite Noise-Isolating Earbuds, $18.60 , available at Amazon
A heavier duty case Amazon If you've already gone through the experience of having Apple replace your iPhone because of a drop, use this and the next pick together. Spigen's case insulates your case with a soft and hard layer, with specific fortification of the corners. It's a little bulkier and heavier than the JETech case I mentioned earlier, but will provide significantly more protection if your phone falls.
Spigen Tough Armor Heavy Duty iPhone 6 Case, $17.47, available at Amazon
A screen protector Amazon Nothing is worse than a scratched screen, whether from keys in your pocket or a light fall. Three times the hardness of plastic, this screen protector will do more to keep your phone safe from the power of gravity than your standard one.
Wolf Totem iP hone Screen Protector, $5.99, available at Amazon
A better Lightning cable Amazon Our pick for the best Lightning cable , Monoprice's cable holds up where Apple's falters: the durability department. Apple cables are notorious for fraying over time, but after seven months of testing, Monoprice's held up. They're more expensive than most other brands, but still less expensive than Apple's official Lightning cable.
Monoprice Lightning Cable (4ft), $14.48, available at Amazon
A multi-port wall charger Amazon This is on the list to help settle disputes. If you're in a home with multiple people who need to charge their devices at the same time, this Anker wall charger will save you an outlet. It doesn't support quick charging, but neither does the iPhone, so you won't be missing out on anything. Instead you and a friend or family member can charge your devices simultaneously. Just remember to pick up an extra Monoprice cable.
Anker 24W Dual USB Wall Charger PowerPort, $10.99, available at Amazon
A dock Amazon An iPhone dock is something you don't realize you need until you buy one. Stick it on a desk and you'll have a place to put your phone. Every. Single. Time. Once it becomes routine, you'll dock your phone without noticing and always have a full battery. Plus, it's nice to have your phone upright on your desk if you get a notification, where you can quickly glance over and decide if it's worth your time.
Spinido iPhone Charging Dock Station, $12.99, available at Amazon
This article was originally published on 7/26/2016.
